channel.title: How do u do this?
channel.description: how do you change wat the players start with??

item.title: How do u do this?
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Devil Unholy Devil
item.description:
@Unholy_Devil wrote:

Are you talking about what they look like? Or what kind of equipment they start out with?

For what they look like:
do this.

whats ever you want your guy to start out with pick the number that it is.

For what they start out with:

Did you make a new guy and tryed it? Becuase if you just keep logging on your guy your not gonna get your items unless you delete your char.

Read full topic

like hare male 23 legs 34 or sumthin like tht?

item.title: How do u do this?
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Devil Unholy Devil
item.description:
@Unholy_Devil wrote:

[quote=“kevvdogg, post:3, topic:165884”]//Giving the player an unique look /*playerEquipment[playerHat]=1050; playerEquipment[playerCape]=2412; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1704; playerEquipment[playerChest]=3387; playerEquipment[playerShield]=2890; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4131; playerEquipment[playerHands]=1059; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=4131; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1545;
how come this dosnt work?[/quote]

Did you compile? If you did try this. Close your Source Folder. Open back up. Compile it. Run Server, log on and see if it works. MAKE SURE YOU SAVED IT WHEN YOU CHANGED IT

Read full topic

item.title: How do u do this?
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Devil Unholy Devil
item.description:
@Unholy_Devil wrote:

go in player.java and

  1. Ctrl F
    2)//Giving the player an unique look
    3)Change the ID numbers and you should get something like this:

playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;

where the “-1s” are change that to the ID of the item you want it to wear

Read full topic
